report.rawcontent: ##all plots Ploughed: Sept 28, 1951. Seed drilled Winter barley - Pioneer at 3 bushels per acre on "Winter" plots: Dec 3. Seed drilled Spring barley - Plumage Archer at 3 bushels per acre on "Spring" plots, N1 nitrochalk applied at 2 cwt/acre to plots 1, 6, 11b (3), 10b: Mar 17, 1952. N2 nitrochalk applied at 4 cwt/acre to plots 3, 9, 11b (1), 11a: Mar 17, 1952 N3 nitrochalk applied at 6 cwt/acre to plots 7, 4, 11b (2), 10a: Mar 17, 1952 Sprayed with D.N.0.C.: May 19. Harvested: Winter barley - July 29, harvested Spring barley - Aug 15

53/4/8 ##all plots Ploughed: Aug 26, 1952. 'Winter' seed drilled Pioneer at 3 bushels per acre: Oct 9. 'Spring' seed drilled Plumage Archer at 3 bushels per acre: Mar 5, 1953. N1 nitrochalk applied at 2 cwt/acre to plots 3, 9, 11b (1), 11a: Mar 13. N2 nitrochalk applied at 4 cwt/acre to plots 7, 4, 11b (2), 10a: Mar 13. N3 nitrochalk applied at 6 cwt/acre to plots 1, 6, 11b (3), 10b: Mar 13. Sprayed with DNOC at 6 1b in 80 gallons per acre: May 22. Harvested: Aug 17.

##all plots Ploughed: Sept 17, 1953. Seed drilled Plummage Archer at 3 bushels per acre: Mar 17, 1954. N1 nitrochalk applied at 2 cwt/acre to plots 7, 2, 11b (2), 10a: Mar 19. N2 nitrochalk applied at 4 cwt/acre to plots 1, 6, 11b (3), 10b: Mar 19. N3 nitrochalk applied at 6 cwt/acre to plots 3, 9, 11b (1), 11a: Mar 19. Harvested: Sept 7.

##all plots Ploughed: Nov 3, 1954. First dressing of chalk applied: Feb 15, 1955. Second dressing of chalk applied: Mar 8. Ploughed: Mar 18. Third dressing of chalk applied: Apr 6. Seed drilled Plumage Archer at 3 bushels per acre: Apr 7. N1 nitrochalk applied at 2 cwt/acre to plots 1, 6, 11b (3), 10b: Apr 12. N2 nitrochalk applied at 4 cwt/acre to plots 3, 9, 11b (1), 11a: Apr 12. N3 nitrochalk applied at 6 cwt/acre to plots 7, 4, 11b (2), 10a: Apr 12. Sprayed with MCPA amine at 2.5 pints per acre in low volume: May 22. Harvested: Aug 24.

##Wheat Ploughed: Sept 26, 1955. Half of each plot sprayed with TCA (trichloracetic acid), 20 1b in 40 gallons per acre: Nov 30, 1955, Mar 28, 1956. Ploughed across plots: June 18 - 20. Remaining half plots sprayed with TCA at 20 lb in 40 gallons per acre: July 26, Sept 26. Ground chalk applied to certain areas at 7.5 and 15 cwt CaCO per acre: Aug 15. ##Barley Ploughed: Sept 7 - 25, 1955. Half of each plot sprayed with TCA, 20 1b in 40 gallons per acre: Dec 1, 1955, Mar 28, 1956. Floughed across plots: June 18 - 20. Remaining half plots sprayed with TCA at 20 1b in 40 gallons per acre: July 25, Sept 26, Ground chalk applied to certain areas at 7.5 and 15 cwt CaCO per acre: Aug 15.

##Wheat Ploughed: Nov 20, 1956, Apr 16, 1957, July 29. Ground chalk applied to certain areas at 7.5 and 15 cwt CaCO per acre: Aug 8. ##Barley Ploughed: Nov 20, 1956, Apr 16, 1957, July 29. Ground chalk applied to certain areas at 7.5 and 15 cwt CaCO per acre: Aug 8.

##wheat: Ploughed: Nov 20, 1956, Apr 16 1957, July 23, 1957. Ground chalk applied: aug 8. Winter sown wheat - Squarehead's Master 13/4 drilled: Nov 19, Spring sown wheat - Peko drilled: Mar 21, 1958. On account of poor development, particularly of the winter sown crops, it was decided to plough out the whole area of this experiment on May 28, 1958.
##Barley: Ploughed: Nov 21, 1956, Apr 17 1957, July 30, 1357. Ground chalk applied: Aug 8, Winter sown barley - Pioneer drilled: Nov 19. Spring sown barley - Plumage Archer drilled: Mar 21, 1358. On account of poor development, particularly of the winter sown crops, it was decided to plough out the whole area of this experiment on May 27, 1958.
